title: Designer's Republic fonts--please ID.
content:
Hi folks,

Are these custom fonts that DR created or are they available for sale somewhere? Help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141029171814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dr1_6506.jpg)
 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141029171814im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dr2_5523.jpg)
author: jcon

comments.content:
good question ... i'd speculate that they're all custom.

might find some similar stuff at Type Different.

[http://www.typedifferent.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141029171814/http:/www.typedifferent.com/ "http://www.typedifferent.com/")

Ages ago I downloaded a "DR Font Pack" from usenet, which included the top one as "Wip3out" (it was used in the PSX game of the same name). I have no idea if the fonts were "real" in so much as a DR release (possible, knowing them and I do vaguely remember an interview with DR/Tomato - Creative Review I think - saying they were going to release them) or just a fan-boy creation.

Dafont.com might be the place to look for the A-Z only copies.

s
